oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Turtle race at Colemere Club, Nashville, Tennessee, 1959 May 27
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Middle Tennessee food industry businessmen racing turtles at the Colemere Club in Nashville, Tennessee. A photograph similar to this one appeared in the May 27, 1959 Nashville Banner newspaper with the following caption: "H. G. Hill, Jr., peers over the shoulders of Julian Ragland, of C.B. Ragland Co., John Duffy, Kroger Co., as turtles 'scratch off' at the Middle Tennessee Food Brokers derby Wednesday night at the Colemere Club." Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 3.25 x 4.25 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hill, H. G., 1900-1993; Ragland, Julian; Duffy, John
Colemere Club (Nashville, Tenn.); Middle Tennessee Food Brokers Association
